Tips

1. Please use athe mobile phone number linked to your ID.
2. Please enterinputenter the password for your account onto access to the operatorcarrier (Chinamobile, China Unicom or China Telecom). the carrier’s website. Usually, you need this password to access customer services.
3. After clicking “submit” you’ll receive a text message from the operatorcarrier, but no need to replycarrier. You don’t have to respond.
4. If you forgot your password, please visit your operatorcarrier’scarrier’s website for retrieval assistance.

The token on thein DCC business chain can only be transferred between the wallet addresses in DCC businesson this chain and are compatible with ERC20. , iIf the transfer is to the wallet on ETH business chain, then it is necessary to go forplease use cross- chain transfer function when the token on DCC business chain is intended for ETH..

Incentive Plan\nBitExpress is a credit-based digital currency loan App., In inorder to encourage users to set up their own credit record of block-chainon the blockchain, and ensure good loan behaviors for furtherfuture loans, any loan transaction occurred on DCC public-chain will have the chance tocan participate in our incentive plan for multiple rewards, and rewards are available.

Data incentive\nVerification is free-of-charge for all data during the early phase. of BitExpress on line, Aall submitted and verified data from the users will be offered with corresponding DCC rewards.

Sharing incentive\nAny user invited hiswho invites friends to digital asset loan through APP will be offered with reward on BitExpressto borrow on BitExpress will receive rewards., oOnce the invited user’s loan application of your friend is approved,, 50% of the service fee of this loan application service fee will be offered to yourewarded to the inviter.

Contribution Rewards (Mining Rewards)\nDifferent contribution can generate from the behavior of BitExpress usersContribution generated by various behaviors on BitExpress will be calculated every 3 hours, for each 3 hours,and the user could collect candies as the reward fromin Candy Collection functionsection. Candies include token rewards from partners of BitExpress., who will be rewarded with various Token issued from organizations partnered with BitExpress

Eco Rewards\nBottom credit network of BitExpress is constructed on Distributed Credit Chain, thus the DCC Eco Incentive Rule generates, BitExpress user behavior is offered with Eco reward automatically issues by DCC. For details, please refer to DCC website atAs BitExpress is based on the DCC ecosystem, DCC also rewards the user for various behaviors. For details, please visit http://dcc.finance, for strategies published.

The QR code shows the plaintext of your private key statement, which is the authentication approach toconveys your ownership of the wallet. Through importing the private key, you can use the wallet could be used on any device, and the passage is established togenerate KeyStore document and wallet password. It is We strongly recommended that you properly back it up your private key before using the wallet.
Export 1: Private key statement QR code
Copy the plaintext private key statement

The QR code shows the KEYSTORE information of KEYSTORE, which is the signature protectiontive document for your private key., KEYSTORE document is signed through your wallet password. Either KEYSTORE document or wallet password will not be able to use the wallet. Instead, bothBoth the KEYSTORE document and your wallet address of them are requested to use the wallet on any device. It is strongly recommended that you properly back them uphave a backup of such information before using the wallet.
Export 1: QR code of your KEYSTORE text message QR code
Export 2: KEYSTORE in text format message

After deleting the wallet, you can only import the wallet and re-enbale it. If you failed to back it updon’t have a backup, then there is no way to keep usingyou won’t be able to use the current wallet. It is strongly recommended to back it upup the wallet before you deletinge it.

If you have not backed your wallet up haven’t backed up your wallet, then deleting it could cause you never find your digital asset backyou may be unable to find your digital assets after deleting it., pPlease check and confirm if your wallet has been backed up.
